attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sure that Britian is a very powerful country in the world and I hope they do something about the situation in Gaza and the innocent children from gaza who do not know about anything that is going on just suffering the consequences for the older people's decisions and actions. Thank You very much

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
